content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61)
- Stone furnace at (-27, -59) with coal fuel
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (1, -60)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (1, -60)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5)
- Stone furnace at (2, -56)
- Burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)

### Smelting Array at (1, 1)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at (1, 1)
- Stone furnace at (3, 1) 
- Wooden chests at (1.5, 3.5), (3.5, 3.5), (5.5, 3.5)
- Burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5), (3.5, 2.5), (5.5, 2.5)

### Production Line at (2, 7)
Consists of:
- Stone furnaces at (2, 7), (4, 7)
- Wooden chests at (2.5, 9.5), (4.5, 9.5)
- Burner inserters at (2.5, 8.5), (4.5, 8.5), (3.5, 9.5)

### Copper Cable Assembly at (14.5, 14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5)
- Input chest at (14.5, 11.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 14.5)
- Burner inserters at (14.5, 12.5), (12.5, 14.5)

### Electronic Circuit Assembly at (21.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5)
- Input chests at (21.5, 11.5), (21.5, 12.5)
- Output chest at (24.5, 15.5)
- Burner inserters at (21.5, 13.5), (23.5, 15.5)

### Power Generation Complex
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (2.5, 36.5)
- Boiler at (37.5, 19)
- Steam engine at (43.5, 19.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with fluid connections
- When connecting pipes vertically, ensure there is a valid path between start and end points
- Check that pipe segments can be properly connected before attempting to create fluid networks

### Power connection issues
- Multiple entities showing "not receiving electricity" warnings
- Ensure power poles are properly connected in a network
- Check that power generators (steam engines) are properly set up with water and fuel

### Resource handling issues
- Several inserters showing "waiting for source items" - ensure proper item flow
- Furnaces showing "no ingredients to smelt" - verify input material delivery
- Some furnaces showing "full output" - ensure output is being removed
